title: Unclear how test flags are determined
body:
by **elazarl**: 
In http://tip.golang.org/cmd/go/#Test_packages the last argument to the test command is
flags to test binaries. Since package name can potentially start with hyphen, it is
unclear how to disambiguate package names from test flags.

Similar issue arises for go run, with packages ending with ".go".

I'm not saying Go should support weird package names, but the rules for argument parsing
should be spelled out clearly in the docs.
